entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 5:39 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: WSW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023
